LanguageData.Apparel_RimwaveBlueCoat.label: Blue army uniform
LanguageData.Apparel_RimwaveBlueCoat.description: The Blue Army uniform consists of a trench coat, boots, helmet, gloves, and a gas mask with a hose connected to a tank on the lower back.The coat is zipped down to the belt and has Blue patches on the soldiers and wrists along with a Blue trim around the bottom near the feet.
